questions.volume: How much blood have you vomited? (small amount, cupful, large amount)
questions.color: What color is the blood? (bright red, dark red, coffee-ground appearance)
questions.medical_history: Do you have liver disease, ulcers, or history of GI bleeding?
questions.medications: Are you taking blood thinners, aspirin, or NSAIDs?

triage_rules.expression: 'large' in str(volume).lower() or 'bright red' in str(color).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Active upper GI bleeding - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Hematemesis with liver disease - Possible variceal bleeding - Emergency care required
